listData.name: myBlue Variable O/Occ P+I (up to 60% LVR)
listData.description: Our most flexible home loan.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible Repayments - weekly, fortnightly or monthly
Customers can receive up to 8 offset accounts in total.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Maximum Loan to Value Ratio of 60%

eligibility.additionalValue: Must be an Australian resident or citizen, with an Australian residential mailing address

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply

fees.name: TITLEPRODFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to produce the title to you or another credit provider

fees.name: TITLESEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you undertake a title search in relation to any security

fees.name: SETTLEMENTATTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are required to attend any settlement on your behalf

fees.name: SEARCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we undertake any search in relation to your company or business at ASIC

fees.name: PROGPAYMENT
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the 8th and any subsequent drawdown on a construction loan

fees.name: PHOTOCOPYFEE
fees.additionalInfo: $3 per page. Payable when you ask us to photocopy documents for you

fees.name: DISCHARGE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when any security is wholly or partially discharged.

fees.name: REDRAW
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time you request a redraw on your loan over the counter. For all loans apart from Interest Saver loans, this fee is waived for the first redraw requested each month. This fee does not apply if your request is processed via iBank

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to consent to a second mortgage on any security

fees.name: DEFAULTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the last day of each month during which there is an amount overdue for payment on your loan.

fees.name: AGENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we need to instruct an agent in connection with the settlement of your loan

fees.name: CHQFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each cheque required on settlement in excess of five (5) cheques

fees.name: DUPLICATESTATEMENTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Duplicate Statement Fee - $2 per page of statement produced. Payable when you ask us to produce duplicate statements for you.

fees.name: LEGALCOSTS
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we pay our solicitors as a result of your application for a variabtion to, discharge of or our consent to any variation of your agreement or security

fees.name: SECURITYSEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable if we need to search a register in relation to any security

fees.name: VALFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we have to pay a valuer as a result of your application for our consent to any matter relating to this agreement or the security, a variation of the agreement or security, or for a progress payment under a construction loan

fees.name: CONTRACTVARIATIONFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in the event we agree to vary your loan agreement

fees.name: DISHONOURFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a direct debit from another account to your loan is declined or a cheque deposited to your loan account is dishonoured

fees.name: SWITCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you convert from one interest rate option to another. This fee is in addition to any break costs payable

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is calculated daily and applied monthly

listData.name: myBlue Variable Investment I/O (60.01 - 80.00% LVR)
listData.description: Our most flexible home loan.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible Repayments - weekly, fortnightly or monthly
Customers can receive up to 8 offset accounts in total.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicable for a Loan to Value Ratio (LVR) of 60.01-80.00%

eligibility.additionalValue: Must be an Australian resident or citizen, with an Australian residential mailing address

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply

fees.name: TITLEPRODFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to produce the title to you or another credit provider

fees.name: TITLESEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you undertake a title search in relation to any security

fees.name: SETTLEMENTATTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are required to attend any settlement on your behalf

fees.name: SEARCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we undertake any search in relation to your company or business at ASIC

fees.name: PROGPAYMENT
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the 8th and any subsequent drawdown on a construction loan

fees.name: PHOTOCOPYFEE
fees.additionalInfo: $3 per page. Payable when you ask us to photocopy documents for you

fees.name: DISCHARGE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when any security is wholly or partially discharged.

fees.name: REDRAW
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time you request a redraw on your loan over the counter. For all loans apart from Interest Saver loans, this fee is waived for the first redraw requested each month. This fee does not apply if your request is processed via iBank

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to consent to a second mortgage on any security

fees.name: DEFAULTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the last day of each month during which there is an amount overdue for payment on your loan.

fees.name: AGENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we need to instruct an agent in connection with the settlement of your loan

fees.name: CHQFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each cheque required on settlement in excess of five (5) cheques

fees.name: DUPLICATESTATEMENTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Duplicate Statement Fee - $2 per page of statement produced. Payable when you ask us to produce duplicate statements for you.

fees.name: LEGALCOSTS
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we pay our solicitors as a result of your application for a variabtion to, discharge of or our consent to any variation of your agreement or security

fees.name: SECURITYSEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable if we need to search a register in relation to any security

fees.name: VALFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we have to pay a valuer as a result of your application for our consent to any matter relating to this agreement or the security, a variation of the agreement or security, or for a progress payment under a construction loan

fees.name: CONTRACTVARIATIONFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in the event we agree to vary your loan agreement

fees.name: DISHONOURFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a direct debit from another account to your loan is declined or a cheque deposited to your loan account is dishonoured

fees.name: SWITCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you convert from one interest rate option to another. This fee is in addition to any break costs payable

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is calculated daily and applied monthly

listData.description: Feel right at home with our ongoing low rate.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible Repayments - weekly, fortnightly or monthly
Customers can receive up to 8 offset accounts in total.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Maximum Loan to Value Ratio of 60%

eligibility.additionalValue: Must be an Australian resident or citizen, with an Australian residential mailing address

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply

fees.name: TITLEPRODFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to produce the title to you or another credit provider

fees.name: TITLESEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you undertake a title search in relation to any security

fees.name: SETTLEMENTATTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are required to attend any settlement on your behalf

fees.name: SEARCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we undertake any search in relation to your company or business at ASIC

fees.name: PROGPAYMENT
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the 8th and any subsequent drawdown on a construction loan

fees.name: PHOTOCOPYFEE
fees.additionalInfo: $3 per page. Payable when you ask us to photocopy documents for you

fees.name: DISCHARGE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when any security is wholly or partially discharged.

fees.name: REDRAW
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time you request a redraw on your loan over the counter. For all loans apart from Interest Saver loans, this fee is waived for the first redraw requested each month. This fee does not apply if your request is processed via iBank

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to consent to a second mortgage on any security

fees.name: DEFAULTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the last day of each month during which there is an amount overdue for payment on your loan.

fees.name: AGENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we need to instruct an agent in connection with the settlement of your loan

fees.name: CHQFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each cheque required on settlement in excess of five (5) cheques

fees.name: DUPLICATESTATEMENTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Duplicate Statement Fee - $2 per page of statement produced. Payable when you ask us to produce duplicate statements for you.

fees.name: LEGALCOSTS
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we pay our solicitors as a result of your application for a variabtion to, discharge of or our consent to any variation of your agreement or security

fees.name: SECURITYSEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable if we need to search a register in relation to any security

fees.name: VALFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we have to pay a valuer as a result of your application for our consent to any matter relating to this agreement or the security, a variation of the agreement or security, or for a progress payment under a construction loan

fees.name: CONTRACTVARIATIONFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in the event we agree to vary your loan agreement

fees.name: DISHONOURFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a direct debit from another account to your loan is declined or a cheque deposited to your loan account is dishonoured

fees.name: SWITCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you convert from one interest rate option to another. This fee is in addition to any break costs payable

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is calculated daily and applied monthly

Customers can receive up to 8 offset accounts in total.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicable for a Loan to Value Ratio (LVR) of 90.01-95.00%

eligibility.additionalValue: Must be an Australian resident or citizen, with an Australian residential mailing address

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply

fees.name: TITLEPRODFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to produce the title to you or another credit provider

fees.name: TITLESEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you undertake a title search in relation to any security

fees.name: SETTLEMENTATTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are required to attend any settlement on your behalf

fees.name: SEARCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we undertake any search in relation to your company or business at ASIC

fees.name: PROGPAYMENT
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the 8th and any subsequent drawdown on a construction loan

fees.name: PHOTOCOPYFEE
fees.additionalInfo: $3 per page. Payable when you ask us to photocopy documents for you

fees.name: DISCHARGE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when any security is wholly or partially discharged.

fees.name: REDRAW
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time you request a redraw on your loan over the counter. For all loans apart from Interest Saver loans, this fee is waived for the first redraw requested each month. This fee does not apply if your request is processed via iBank

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to consent to a second mortgage on any security

fees.name: DEFAULTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the last day of each month during which there is an amount overdue for payment on your loan.

fees.name: AGENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we need to instruct an agent in connection with the settlement of your loan

fees.name: CHQFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each cheque required on settlement in excess of five (5) cheques

fees.name: DUPLICATESTATEMENTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Duplicate Statement Fee - $2 per page of statement produced. Payable when you ask us to produce duplicate statements for you.

fees.name: LEGALCOSTS
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we pay our solicitors as a result of your application for a variabtion to, discharge of or our consent to any variation of your agreement or security

fees.name: SECURITYSEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable if we need to search a register in relation to any security

fees.name: VALFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we have to pay a valuer as a result of your application for our consent to any matter relating to this agreement or the security, a variation of the agreement or security, or for a progress payment under a construction loan

fees.name: CONTRACTVARIATIONFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in the event we agree to vary your loan agreement

fees.name: DISHONOURFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a direct debit from another account to your loan is declined or a cheque deposited to your loan account is dishonoured

fees.name: SWITCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you convert from one interest rate option to another. This fee is in addition to any break costs payable

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is calculated daily and applied monthly

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to consent to a second mortgage on any security

fees.name: DEFAULTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the last day of each month during which there is an amount overdue for payment on your loan.

fees.name: AGENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we need to instruct an agent in connection with the settlement of your loan

fees.name: CHQFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each cheque required on settlement in excess of five (5) cheques

fees.name: DUPLICATESTATEMENTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Duplicate Statement Fee - $2 per page of statement produced. Payable when you ask us to produce duplicate statements for you.

fees.name: LEGALCOSTS
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we pay our solicitors as a result of your application for a variabtion to, discharge of or our consent to any variation of your agreement or security

fees.name: SECURITYSEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable if we need to search a register in relation to any security

fees.name: VALFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we have to pay a valuer as a result of your application for our consent to any matter relating to this agreement or the security, a variation of the agreement or security, or for a progress payment under a construction loan

fees.name: CONTRACTVARIATIONFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in the event we agree to vary your loan agreement

fees.name: DISHONOURFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a direct debit from another account to your loan is declined or a cheque deposited to your loan account is dishonoured

fees.name: SWITCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you convert from one interest rate option to another. This fee is in addition to any break costs payable

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is calculated daily and applied monthly

listData.description: Feel right at home with our ongoing low rate.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible Repayments - weekly, fortnightly or monthly
Customers can receive up to 8 offset accounts in total.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicable for a Loan to Value Ratio (LVR) of 90.01-95.00%

eligibility.additionalValue: Must be an Australian resident or citizen, with an Australian residential mailing address

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply

fees.name: TITLEPRODFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to produce the title to you or another credit provider

fees.name: TITLESEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you undertake a title search in relation to any security

fees.name: SETTLEMENTATTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are required to attend any settlement on your behalf

fees.name: SEARCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we undertake any search in relation to your company or business at ASIC

fees.name: PROGPAYMENT
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the 8th and any subsequent drawdown on a construction loan

fees.name: PHOTOCOPYFEE
fees.additionalInfo: $3 per page. Payable when you ask us to photocopy documents for you

fees.name: DISCHARGE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when any security is wholly or partially discharged.

fees.name: REDRAW
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time you request a redraw on your loan over the counter. For all loans apart from Interest Saver loans, this fee is waived for the first redraw requested each month. This fee does not apply if your request is processed via iBank

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to consent to a second mortgage on any security

fees.name: DEFAULTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on the last day of each month during which there is an amount overdue for payment on your loan.

fees.name: AGENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we need to instruct an agent in connection with the settlement of your loan

fees.name: CHQFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each cheque required on settlement in excess of five (5) cheques

fees.name: DUPLICATESTATEMENTFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Duplicate Statement Fee - $2 per page of statement produced. Payable when you ask us to produce duplicate statements for you.

fees.name: LEGALCOSTS
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we pay our solicitors as a result of your application for a variabtion to, discharge of or our consent to any variation of your agreement or security

fees.name: SECURITYSEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable if we need to search a register in relation to any security

fees.name: VALFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Priced on application - Payable when we have to pay a valuer as a result of your application for our consent to any matter relating to this agreement or the security, a variation of the agreement or security, or for a progress payment under a construction loan

fees.name: CONTRACTVARIATIONFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in the event we agree to vary your loan agreement

fees.name: DISHONOURFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a direct debit from another account to your loan is declined or a cheque deposited to your loan account is dishonoured

fees.name: SWITCHFEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you convert from one interest rate option to another. This fee is in addition to any break costs payable

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is calculated daily and applied monthly
